column4: i've got two problems: 1. my english is bad wich will make solving the second problem difficult 2. I just made my WLAN work, it worked for just a few minutes, but now nothing is working except IRC. I can't even ping the router even though IRC works fine. when i ping 192.168.2.1 (router) i get "From 192.168.2.101 icmp_seq=3 Destination Host Unreachable" but there are only two devices the router and me (192.168.2.47) so *.*.*.101 shouldn't exis
it's 3am in germany, theres noone there who can help me
go to sleep than? you can bet at 3:30am i will be
do you think the problem is that i'm using xchat?
I think i don't have a proxy
not really knowing what a proxy is
my point alot of people have that issue they shouldnt go through a proxy but ubuntu pushes them to one
did i get you right?: ubuntu forces people to use a problem without telling them and this proxy causes problems?
not always im thinking it has something to do with thier isp
isp is the company you "get your internet" from
thanks, gives my problem some substance
